meanings.definition: The state or quality of being stormy.
meanings.sent1: The storminess of the weather made it difficult to go outside.
meanings.sent2: The dark clouds and strong winds indicated the storminess of the day.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was canceled due to the unexpected storminess of the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like a whirlwind, full of storminess and chaos.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the storminess of the sea in his painting with great detail.

meanings.definition: A turbulent or violent disturbance in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The pilot had to navigate through the storminess to reach the destination.
meanings.sent2: The meteorologist warned of the approaching storminess in the region.
meanings.sent3: The sudden storminess caught everyone by surprise during the outdoor event.
meanings.sent4: The storminess in the sky mirrored the turmoil in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The storminess of the thunderstorm was both frightening and awe-inspiring.
